Lo volví a jugar después de muchos años y sigue igual de atrapante y emocionante. Uno de los mejores juegos.

It has come to my attention that some have lately called me a gamer, as if such a term were shameful. I ask you, what greater endeavor exists than that of gaming? In our current unparalleled enterprise, refusal to become a gamer is simply a refusal to grow--an insistence on suicide, if you will.



Did the pro gamer refuse to take the redpill? It did not. It crept forth boldly while its brethren remained in the blackest ocean abyss, with lidless eyes forever staring at the dark, cringe and unbased despite their eternal vigilance. Would we model ourselves on the trilobite? Are all the accomplishments of the based kings fated to be nothing more than a layer of broken plastic shards thinly strewn across a fossil bed, sandwiched between the Burgess shale and an eon's worth of mud?

In order to be true to our nature, and our destiny, we must aspire to greater things. We have outgrown our bluepilled and unbased self. It is futile to cry for Bid tiddy goth gf milk, when our true sustenance awaits us among the huge based mommy milkers. And only the universal union that small minds call 'The Gamers' can carry us there.

Therefore I say, yes, I am a Racist Gamer. We must all collaborate, willingly, eagerly, if we expect to reap the benefits of basedness. And reap we shall.

Ahh, stary dobry Half-Life, ta gra jak i inne z tej serii bardzo mnie do siebie przyciągnęły, sam nie wiem, co najbardziej powoduje to, że mam chęć w to grać. Half-Life 2 jest świetną grą, ma dobrą fabułę, postacie, sam gameplay jest przyjemny i mimo dobrej grafiki ma bardzo niskie wymagania, działa świetnie nawet na najwyższych ustawieniach na moim komputerze, który nie daje sobie za bardzo rady np. z CS:GO który na najniższych ustawieniach z rozdzielczością 800x600 chodzi w 15-30 fps-ach
I played through it on a friend's Xbox, I played through it on my Xbox, and then I bought it on my PC.

Half-Life 2 is a beautifully written masterpiece. The game has great story and greater gameplay. 

It changes up the style of play a bit though if you are used to the fast thinking from Half-Life 1, as you are a bit more stronger in this game, but overall the game is smooth, and everything feels great.

Лучшая игра! Отличное погружение в игровой мир, интересные уровни. Когда надоедает ходить и стрелять, игра меняется либо на транспорт, либо на головоломки. Мне не нравится уровень напряжения, однако, почему-то я продолжаю играть дальше.
В игре отличный сюжет. Очень интересно узнать, что дальше. Возможно, это мотивирует всё пройти. Даже если я знаю сюжет на перед.
Каждый персонаж чем-то запоминается. Очень понравились Отец Григорий и Пёс.  Часто становится жалко какого-нибудь повстанца или зомби.
Игра нагнетает своей безнадёгой и разрухой, атмосфера как раз для постапокалипсиса.

POG
The Legend

[h1] HL2 is a classic wrapped up in so much history and love that it can't be understated how much of a MUST PLAY this game is. [/h1]

I remember 2004 like it was yesterday, and each year that followed only had more and more life brought in through mods and machinima. I remember the glory days of HL2:DM, Garry's Mod 9, SMOD/SMOD Tactical, and Synergy Co-op. It's too bad that so many of those classic mods aren't playable anymore without a third party launcher, because they WERE my childhood, but even to this day the game sees love in the form of mods like MMod and the continued support of GMod.

As of now the game is on sale for $2, and that's a small price to pay for one of the most magical games to have EVER existed. From the pre-launch leaks and shenanigans, the jaw dropping full release, the mods and support, and flawless sequels, this game was the pinnacle of PC gaming in the 2000's.

实在是引人入胜的一部作品！我还在3个多小时的摸索阶段，却已经停不下来了，太太太太尼玛有意思了。HXD们，当一个fps游戏集富于挑战的探路解谜，惊悚扑朔的场景氛围，淋漓尽致的物件细节种种种种于一身,还能靠你开动脑筋以n种不同方式过关时，其可玩性已经远远超过画质带来的视觉体验本身。过了16年，途经莱温霍姆小镇时你还是会心跳加速；过了16年，你还是难以找到载具体验媲美在运河航道和14号公路飞驰的另一部fps；过了16年，有着丰富内容也不失剧情深意的大作也就那么几个......这就叫宝刀不老——半条命2，划时代的佳作，永远的经典。

Llego muy tarde a jugar a esta saga, y a pesar de que le veo bastante potencial y puedo ignorar la estética de los 2000, etc, me he dado cuenta de que no puedo jugar juegos en primera persona, al menos de este estilo, ya que la cámara me produce mareo. No voy a culpar al juego por lo que ni lo recomiendo ni lo desrecomiendo, pero queda en el olvido de mi biblioteca.
